short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Master Spreadsheet & Database with AI - Turn text into formulas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Magic Formula is the ultimate AI tool that transforms text instructions into accurate spreadsheet and database formulas in seconds. Whether you're working with Excel, Google Sheets, Airtable, or SQL, Magic Formula makes complex formulas easy. Simply input your plain text description, and Magic Formula will generate the exact formula you need, saving time and reducing errors.

With support for functions in Excel, Google Sheets, SQL, VBA, and DAX, Magic Formula is perfect for professionals, data analysts, and anyone looking to streamline their workflow. Boost productivity and eliminate the hassle of manual formula creation with Magic Formula!
